Rulings.Edison: No rulings found for this card. Request new rulings at https://discord.gg/shVJnYJNpg
Rulings.Tengu: No rulings found for this card. Request new rulings at https://discord.gg/MmEZSNeTdX
Rulings.Goat:
●Monsters that are changed to Dragon by an effect are eligible to be targeted by “A Wingbeat of Giant Dragon.”
●Fusion monsters returned to the hand by the effect of “A Wingbeat of Giant Dragon” are returned to the Fusion Deck.
●If the only eligible Dragon monster is removed from the field before “A Wingbeat of Giant Dragon” resolves, the effect of “A Wingbeat of Giant Dragon” disappears.
●“A Wingbeat of Giant Dragon” targets the monster it returns to the hand. The ‘return one Lv 5 or higher Dragon’ is not a cost of activation. 
●“A Wingbeat of a Giant Dragon” may not be activated while “Lord of D.” is applying on the field.
Rulings.HAT:
● You return the monster to the hand when this card resolves.
● If you can't return a monster to your hand, no Spells/Traps are destroyed.
Rulings.Vegas:
● You return the monster to the hand when this card resolves.
● If you can't return a monster to your hand, no Spells/Traps are destroyed.
Rulings.Meadowlands:
● You return the monster to the hand when this card resolves.
● If you can't return a monster to your hand, no Spells/Traps are destroyed.
Rulings.FireWater:
● You return the monster to the hand when this card resolves.
● If you can't return a monster to your hand, no Spells/Traps are destroyed.
Rulings.Cat:
● 'A Wingbeat of Giant Dragon' targets 1 LV 5 or higher Dragon.
● If you select a LV 5 or higher Dragon-Type Fusion Monster, it is returned to your Extra Deck.
● If the selected Dragon is flipped face-down, removed from the field, or has its Monster Type changed, 'A Wingbeat of Giant Dragon's' effect disappears.
Rulings.TeleDAD:
● 'A Wingbeat of Giant Dragon' targets 1 LV 5 or higher Dragon.
● If you select a LV 5 or higher Dragon-Type Fusion Monster, it is returned to your Extra Deck.
● If the selected Dragon is flipped face-down, removed from the field, or has its Monster Type changed, 'A Wingbeat of Giant Dragon's' effect disappears.
